attributes.action: permit alien communication with general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UFOS HAVE BEEN SEEN FOR YEARS. ALIENS HAVE NOT INVADED, FOUGHT WARS, OR TRIED TO CONQUER EARTH. ITS OBVIOUS THEY HAVE CONTACTED GOVERNMENTS WHICH HAVE SPOKEN WITH THEM BUT PROBABLY FORBIDDEN THEM FROM SPEAKING TO THE PUBLIC. SURELY WE CAN LEARN FROM THEM. LIFT THE BAN.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
